title: "Women in Logic Online"

<p> [Agata Ciabattoni](https://www.logic.at/staff/agata/) and [Josephine Dik](https://josephinedik.github.io/), 
supported by Andrea Hackl and the Vienna Center for Logic and Algorithms [VCLA](https://www.vcla.at/) are organizing a series of seminars
["Women in Logic ONLINE"](https://www.vcla.at/women-in-logic/).

* Recorded Videos of the talks are available at the VLCA [video channel](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLdqgJshpd1aWOGdqfrloD69Ev1MSPd0Wg).
they're also slowly added to [Recorded Talks]().

* Talks are expected to happen every two months and you can be notified by subscribing to the mailing list.
